title: Wholesome Bean and Vegetable Soup
ingredients: ['2.5 litres chicken stock', '2 potatoes, cubed', '2 carrots, sliced', '2 sticks celery, diced', '5 fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 head broccoli, chopped', '400g cauliflower florets', '1 parsnip, sliced', '1 onion, chopped', '150g green peas', '240g tinned cut green beans, drained', '240g tinned butter beans, drained', '120g cooked chickpeas', '90g cooked haricot beans', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried parsley']
